text: Harvey M. Meyerhoff (born 1927) is an American businessman, fundraiser, and philanthropist. He is the son of Joseph Meyerhoff. Harvey is a chairman of the trustees of The Johns Hopkins Hospital and Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:American construction businesspeople Category:American real estate businesspeople Category:American people of Ukrainian-Jewish descent Category:American philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from Baltimore Category:Jewish American philanthropists Category:Maryland culture Category:Maryland lawyers Category:20th-century philanthropists Category:University of Wisconsin-Madison alumni Category:Possibly living people
title: Harvey Meyerhoff
